card.name: Arktos
card.cardtext: 1, Flip Arktos [>] Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Arktos while defending in bear form this turn.
card.flavortext: "The Great Bear Spirit speaks to me, and it is my duty to share what it teaches."

card.name: Bildros Nullvoid
card.cardtext: 2, Flip Bildros [>] Pet cards in your hand are instant this turn.
card.flavortext: "Fools are quick to dismiss what they don't understand as evil. I see what I do as a series of calculated risks in exchange for greater power and insight. Oh, with demons."

card.name: Blaize Brightspark
card.cardtext: 1, Flip Blaize [>] Blaize deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally that was dealt fire damage this turn.
card.flavortext: "Fire burns everyone - it doesn't care who you are!"

card.name: Chaigon Steelsight
card.cardtext: 1, Flip Chaigon [>] Target ally has -3 ATK this turn.
card.flavortext: The wilds of Outland were a far cry from Dun Morogh, but Chaigon always liked a challenge.

card.name: Dralor
card.cardtext: 4, Flip Dralor [>] Look at target player's hand and choose an ally card. He discards that card. Use only on your turn.
card.flavortext: "Fewer witnesses. I like that."

card.name: Halavar
card.cardtext: Flip Halavar [>] You pay 1 less to play your next Two-Handed weapon this turn.
card.flavortext: "The Horde is prepared to meet any threat head on. Perhaps you'd like a demonstration?"

card.name: Keegana Silvershield
card.cardtext: 5, Flip Keegana [>] Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies. Keegana deals 1 holy damage to each of them. Use only on your turn.
card.flavortext: "Light, lend me strength to bring peace to this shattered land."

card.name: Kintara Wintermoon
card.cardtext: 3, Flip Kintara [>] Target player puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand. Use only on your turn.
card.flavortext: Even the light of the moon casts a shadow.

card.name: Memri the Channeler
card.cardtext: 2, Flip Memri [>] Memri deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally for each Totem you have.
card.flavortext: "Even in this broken world, the elements spark."

card.name: Bloody Mary
card.cardtext: 2, Flip Bloody Mary [>] Opposing allies have -1 ATK this turn.
card.flavortext: "Death has taught me many lessons in the art of combat. Let me show you one."

card.name: Bo'ja, Arcanist Absolute
card.cardtext: 5, Flip Bo'ja Target player readies all of his resources.
card.flavortext: "Da arcane is da key to everything. Lemme show you how to use it, eh!"

card.name: Chancellor Velora
card.cardtext: 2, Flip Velora [>] Velora deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
card.flavortext: "The Light rewards faith, not form."

card.name: Forang Deathrattle
card.cardtext: 3, Flip Forang [>] Forang deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from himself for ach damage dealt this way. Use only on your turn.
card.flavortext: The ruined world of Draenor serves as a caution to those who would follow in Gul'dan's footsteps.

card.name: Hekto Starspire
card.cardtext: 4, Flip Hekto [>] Destroy target attacking ally.
card.flavortext: "Revenge for my people consumes my every thought! You cannot hope to stop me from reaching my goals."

card.name: Kassandra Flameheart
card.cardtext: 2, Flip Kassandra [>] Target Pet has +3 ATK this turn.
card.flavortext: "A pet is not a tool. A tool does not work harder for a caring master."

card.name: Taheo Skyspeaker
card.cardtext: 4, Flip Taheo [>] Choose one: Taheo deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally; or Taheo heals 6 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
card.flavortext: "As nature is a force for balance, my methods must be the same."

card.name: Urrth
card.cardtext: 3, Flip Urrth [>] Draw a card for each Totem you have.
card.flavortext: "I must commune with the spirits and seek their guidance in this matter."

card.name: Zag'zil
card.cardtext: X, Flip Zag'zil [>] Destroy target weapon with cost X. Use only on your turn.
card.flavortext: "Fair fights be overrated, mon!"

card.name: Barkskin
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Your ability, ally, and equipment cards can't be interrupted.
card.flavortext: Trees don't flinch.

card.name: Dreamstate
card.cardtext: Balance Hero Required Ongoing: When you play a Balance ability, draw a card.
card.flavortext: Those who walk the Emerald Dream see the waking world more clearly.

card.name: Druid Training
card.cardtext: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing: Attached ally has "[Activate] [>] Exhaust target ally."

card.name: Earth and Sky
card.cardtext: Choose one: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally; or your hero deals 2 arcane damage to target hero or ally and you draw a card.

card.name: Feral Instinct
card.cardtext:
Feral Hero Required
Ongoing: While in cat form, your hero has +2 ATK while attacking an exhausted defender. While in bear form, your hero has +4 ATK while protecting.
card.flavortext: "There's a time for fighting and a time for hiding. A smart druid knows which is correct without thinking." -Arktos

card.name: Gift of the Wild
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +2 ATK / +2 health.
card.flavortext: "I felt my muscles thicken, my skin harden, and my senses sharpen." - Taheo Skyspeaker

card.name: Invigorating Touch
card.cardtext: Your hero heals 6 damage from target hero.

card.name: Natural Genesis
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Each player may place an additional resource during his turn.

card.name: Shred
card.cardtext: Ongoing: When Shred enters play, your hero may deal 2 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally. Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
card.flavortext: "Of course claws are better than a weapon: they have three times the blades!" - Arktos

card.name: Strangling Roots
card.cardtext: Attach to target ally and exhaust it. Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step. At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached ally.
card.flavortext: The roots not only grip like steel, but they cut like it as well.

card.name: Sustain or Reclaim
card.cardtext: Choose one: Your hero heals all damage from target ally; or put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.
card.flavortext: Druids understand the interdependence of all living things. When this delicate equilibrium is disrupted, the druid works to restore the balance.

card.name: Swipe
card.cardtext: Ongoing:When Swipe enters play, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies. Your hero is in bear form. (Has protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
card.flavortext: "Maybe forming into a line wasn't such a good idea."

card.name: Aspect of the Cheetah
card.cardtext: Ongoing: You pay 1 less to complete quests, to a minimum of 1. When your hero is dealt damage, put Aspect of the Cheetah from play into its owner's hand.
card.flavortext: "It turns three days' travel into two days, provided no one gets in the way." - Chaigon Steelsight

card.name: Bestial Swiftness
card.cardtext: Beast Mastery Hero Required Ongoing: Target Pet has ferocity this turn.
card.flavortext: There are times when talons and claws can outfly the swiftest arrow.

card.name: Blinky
card.cardtext: 3 [>] Remove Blinky from the game and put a warp counter on him. 3, Remove a warp counter [>] Put Blinky into play. Use only if Blinky is removed from the game.
card.flavortext: Terokkar Forest is a bad place to travel if you're jumpy.

card.name: Bloody Welcome
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 3 ranged damage to target ally. If that ally entered play this turn, ready up to two of your resources.
card.flavortext: "I've been expecting you."

card.name: Crippling Shot
card.cardtext: Target hero or ally had -5 ATK this turn.
card.flavortext: A well-placed shot can weaken the strongest arm and slow the swiftest hand.

card.name: Double Barrel
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Your hero has Ranged dual wield. (Can have a second Ranged weapon. Can strike with a second Ranged weapon during the same combat.)
card.flavortext: Sometimes you need a little extra firepower to get the job done.

card.name: Hunter Training
card.cardtext: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing: When an opposing ally enters play, attached ally deals 1 ranged damage to it.

card.name: Ripper
card.cardtext: 3 [>] Double Ripper's ATK this turn.
card.flavortext: To the beasts of Outland, Azeroth is a whole new world of prey.

card.name: Scraps
card.cardtext: At the start of your turn, destroy Scraps unless you remove an ally card in any graveyard from the game.
card.flavortext: "Why is it looking at me like that?"

card.name: Serpent Sting
card.cardtext: Attach to target hero or ally. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character, or 2 if you have a Ranged weapon.
card.flavortext: Laced with poisonous toxins, the serpent sting burns the very blood of its target.

card.name: Thrill of the Hunt
card.cardtext: Survival Hero Required Destroy target ally. If you do, ready up to X of your resources, where X is that ally's cost.
card.flavortext: "Such a thrill drives every hunter, regardless of race or allegiance. It's the thing that binds all hunters together." -Kissandra Flameheart

card.name: Track Demons
card.cardtext: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, look at the top card of your deck. Either put it in your hand and put 3 damage on your hero, or put it on the bottom of your deck.
card.flavortext: "I wouldn't call it courage, exactly, to hunt what no sane being would wish to find." -Chaigon Steelsight

card.name: Arcane Brilliance
card.cardtext: Each friendly player draws a card. Ongoing: Each friendly player's maximum hand size is increased by three.
card.flavortext: "I can share more than food and water, mon." -Bo'ja

card.name: Arcane Explosion
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally. Draw a card for each character dealt damage this way.
card.flavortext: There's only one safe place to stand, and it's occupied.

card.name: Cold Front
card.cardtext: Allies can't attack this turn.
card.flavortext: "I'll freeze you all!" -The Shade of Aran

card.name: Fire Power
card.cardtext: Fire Hero Required Ongoing: When you play a Fire ability or Fire card, your hero may deal 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
card.flavortext: Fire magi focus their training on maximizing the potency and impact of their fire-based spells.

card.name: Fuel for the Fire
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Destroy one of your resources Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target ally.
card.flavortext: "If I can eliminate my opponent, my well-being is irrelevant. As long as I don't blow myself up in the process, that is." -Blaize Brightspark

card.name: Mage Training
card.cardtext: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing: Attached ally has "[Activate] [>] This ally deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally."

card.name: Magma Spike
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 5 fire damage to target hero or ally.
card.flavortext: "Closer! Come closer...and burn!" -Keli'dan the Breaker

card.name: Nether Fracture
card.cardtext: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.

card.name: Portal
card.cardtext: Search your deck for an ally card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
card.flavortext: "The shortest distance between two points is one incantation." -Blaize Brightspark

card.name: Touch of Ice
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. If a hero is dealt damage this way, the next time its controller would draw a card this turn, he skips drawing that card instead.

card.name: Touch of the Arcane
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card for each damage dealt this way.

card.name: Wand Specialization
card.cardtext: Arcane Hero Required Ongoing: Your wands have +2 ATK When you strike with a Wand, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)
card.flavortext: "JUDGE WISDOM!"

card.name: Ardent Defender
card.cardtext: Protection Hero Required Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero while it has 25 or more damage.
card.flavortext: "Why aren't you dead yet?" -Arktos

card.name: Blessed Protector
card.cardtext: Your hero has protector this turn. Draw a card.
card.flavortext: "The blood spilled here today will not be yours, my friend."

card.name: Exorcism
card.cardtext: Destroy target Demon ally or Undead ally.
card.flavortext: The Light glares brightest upon the most sinister of foes.

card.name: Judgement of Light
card.cardtext: Attach to target opposing hero or ally. Ongoing: When a friendly hero or ally deals combat damage to attached character, that friendly character heals 2 damage from itself.
card.flavortext: "The enemy's dark resolve will seep away in the light of your righteousness." -Tome of Divinity

card.name: Judgement of Wisdom
card.cardtext: Attach to target opposing hero or ally. Ongoing: When a friendly hero or ally deals combat damage to attached character, that friendly character's controller draws a card.
card.flavortext: "The enemy's shadow cunning is no match for the pure insight of the Light." -Tome of Divinity

card.name: The Light's Largess
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Destroy The Light's Largess [>] Your hero heals 6 damage from target hero or ally.
card.flavortext: "The Light is mine to command when I need it." - Hekto Starspire

card.name: Martyr's Mending
card.cardtext: Your hero heals any amount of damage from other friendly heroes and allies. Put that much damage on your hero.
card.flavortext: True courage is to take upon oneself the pains of others.

card.name: Paladin Training
card.cardtext: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing: When attached ally deals combat damage, it also heals that much from target hero or ally.

card.name: Reclusion
card.cardtext: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: Prevent all damage that attached ally would deal.

card.name: Sacred Purification
card.cardtext: Destroy target ability. If it was attached to a friendly hero or ally, draw a card.

card.name: Sanctity Aura
card.cardtext: Retribution Hero Required Ongoing: Holy allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking. If your hero would deal holy damage, it deals that much +2 instead.
card.flavortext: From the youngest child to the most veteran soldier, the Light heartens all who are worthy.

card.name: Sheath of Light
card.cardtext: Ongoing: [Activate] [>] Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target ally this turn.

card.name: Absorb Magic
card.cardtext: Destroy target ability. If you do, your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ability's cost.

card.name: Chasten
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

card.name: Heartening Arrival
card.cardtext: Ongoing: When an ally enters play under your control, your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

card.name: Holy Nova
card.cardtext: Holy Hero Required You hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally and heals 1 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

card.name: Infusion of Fortitude
card.cardtext: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 health.

card.name: Kindred Spirits
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Your hero can't be destroyed while another friendly hero or ally is in play.

card.name: Mental Anguish
card.cardtext: Target player discards two cards.
card.flavortext: It may all be in your head, but that doesn't make it hurt any less.

card.name: Prayer of Fortitude
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Heroes and allies in your party have +5 health.
card.flavortext: "Just as the Light connects all our hearts and souls, so let it protect us now in these dark and troubled times." -Kintara Wintermoon

card.name: Priest Training
card.cardtext: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing: Attached ally has "[Activate] [>] This ally heals 5 damage from target hero or ally."

card.name: Shadow Weaving
card.cardtext: Shadow Hero Required Attach to target opposing hero or ally. Ongoing: If attached character would be dealt shadow damage, it's dealt that much +2 instead.

card.name: Touch of Darkness
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally. If a hero is dealt damage this way, its controller discards a card.
card.flavortext: Even a brush with the shadow can teat a mind apart.

card.name: Twist of Faith
card.cardtext: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: You control attached ally.
card.flavortext: "Your will is weak. Your mind is mine."

card.name: Adrenaline Rush
card.cardtext: Combat Hero Required Ready all of your resources. Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size. At end of turn, discard your hand.
card.flavortext: "Let'sget'em! Whatarewewaitingfor? Gogogo!"

card.name: Blind
card.cardtext: Target player can't play cards this turn.
card.flavortext: "Arrghh! My eyes!"

card.name: Cheat Death
card.cardtext: Subtlety Hero Required Remove your hero from the game. As your next turn starts, put it into play flipped the same way and with the same damage. (You can’t play cards while your hero is removed.)
card.flavortext: As assassins and redistributors of wealth, rogues specialize in avoiding unpleasant confrontations.

card.name: Head Trauma
card.cardtext: Destroy target resource.

card.name: Hide and Stab
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Your hero has stealth. (Can't protect against it.) When your hero deals damage, destroy Hide and Stab. Destroy Hide and Stab [>] Exhaust target hero or ally.

card.name: Obfuscate
card.cardtext: Target hero or ally has +2 ATK while attacking and has stealth this turn. (Can't protect against it.)

card.name: On the Brink
card.cardtext: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: When attached ally becomes exhausted, destroy it.

card.name: Roque Training
card.cardtext: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing: When attached ally deals combat damage to a defending hero, that hero's controller discards a card.

card.name: Sprint
card.cardtext: Ongoing: [Activate] [>] Choose one: Ready your hero; or if your hero is defending, remove all attacking allies from combat.
card.flavortext: Sometimes you just have to get away from it all.

card.name: Thick as Thieves
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Allies with Stealth in your party are elusive and untargetable.

card.name: Unfair Advantage
card.cardtext: As an additional cost to play Unfair Advantage, remove up to five combo cards in your graveyard from the game. Target player discards that many cards.

card.name: Wound Poison
card.cardtext: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn. Ongoing: Attached character can't be healed. At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character.

card.name: Chill
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.

card.name: Eathrend Weapon
card.cardtext: Attach to one of your Melee weapons. Ongoing: Attached weapon has +7 ATK.
card.flavortext: "A blade imbued with hot magma is not concerned with things so trivial as armor." -Urrth

card.name: Earth's Bounty
card.cardtext: Put target card from your graveyard into your hand.
card.flavortext: "The earth speaks to me. It will grant me what I need."

card.name: Echo of the Elements
card.cardtext: Ongoing: When your hero heals damage, it also deals that much nature damage to target opposing ally.

card.name: Elements' Fury
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero and 3 nature damage to target ally.

card.name: Mana Spring Totem
card.cardtext: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, draw a card. (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)
card.flavortext: Water is the element of life and energy.

card.name: Reincarnation
card.cardtext: Ongoing: If your hero would be destroyed, remove Reincarnation from the game and remove all but 14 damage from your hero instead.
card.flavortext: "Death cannot thwart the will of the elements. I still have much work to do." - Urrth

card.name: Sentry Totem
card.cardtext: Ongoing: When an opposing ally enters play, exhaust it. (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)
card.flavortext: Aided by the Spirit of Air, a shaman may be able to see faraway objects or events, whether the distance be physical or temporal.

card.name: Shaman Training
card.cardtext: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing: When attached ally attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready it.

card.name: Stoneclaw Totem
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can attack only Stoneclaw Totem if able. When a hero or ally deals combat damage to Stoneclaw Totem, that character can't ready during its controller's next ready step. (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

card.name: Totem of Wrath
card.cardtext: Elemental Hero Required Ongoing: If an ally in your party would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +2 instead. (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

card.name: Totemic Focus
card.cardtext: Restoration Hero Required Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play totems.
card.flavortext: "Simple wood can hold so much power if the elements permit it." -Urrth

card.name: Banish
card.cardtext: Remove target Demon ally or Elemental ally from the game.
card.flavortext: When you draw power from demons, it's a good idea to have a backup plan in case they disagree.

card.name: Curse of Contagion
card.cardtext: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached ally. When attached ally is destroyed, you may put Curse of Contagion from it owner's graveyard into play attached to target ally.

card.name: Drain Mana
card.cardtext: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy Drain Mana unless you pay 4. At the end of your turn, target opponent discards a card and you draw draw a card
card.flavortext: Tremendous power comes from a warlock's ability to sustain complex rituals.

card.name: Fel Pact
card.cardtext: Attach to target Demon ally. Ongoing: Attached ally can't be destroyed.

card.name: Haaroon
card.cardtext: Demonology Hero Required Protector
card.flavortext: These soldiers of the Burning Legion can be controlled only by those most skilled in the demonic arts.

card.name: Invoke the Nether
card.cardtext: Remove all allies from the game.
card.flavortext: "It all ends here." -Forang Deathrattle

card.name: Rulrin
card.cardtext: Elusive (Can't be attacked.) Untargetable

card.name: Siphon Life
card.cardtext: Affliction Hero Required Attach to target hero or ally. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached character and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

card.name: Soul Inversion
card.cardtext: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK / -2 health.
card.flavortext: "There's always a cost for power - you just have to decide whether or not you can afford it." - Forang Deathrattle

card.name: Swallow Soul
card.cardtext: Interrupt target ally card. If you do, remove it from the game.
card.flavortext: "Shaza-kie!!"

card.name: Thulthun
card.cardtext: Opposing allies lose and can't have elusive or stealth.
card.flavortext: No one can hide from the hounds of Hakkar.

card.name: Warlock Training
card.cardtext: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing: When attached ally attacks, you may put target opposing ally into its owner's hand.

card.name: Gear Upgrade
card.cardtext: As an additional cost to play Gear Upgrade, destroy one of your equipment. Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: Intensify Rage
card.cardtext: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 ATK / +3 health. At the start of your turn, put 2 damage on attached ally.

card.name: Piercing Howl
card.cardtext: Fury Hero Required Target opponent puts three allies from his party on top of their owner's deck.
card.flavortext: A warrior's deafening howl can break an enemy's ranks from within.

card.name: Puncture
card.cardtext: Destroy target ally or equipment.
card.flavortext: "Armor and people have at least one thing in common: they stop working once you put a big hole in them." -Halavar

card.name: Retaliation
card.cardtext: Ongoing: You pay 10 less to strike with melee weapons while your hero is defending
card.flavortext: "Back off, pup!" -Watchkeeper Gargolmar

card.name: Safeguard
card.cardtext: Ready your hero. Ongoing: Your hero has protector.
card.flavortext: "Inexperienced warriors underestimate the value of momentum in a fight." -Halavar

card.name: Salt the Wounds
card.cardtext: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally with damage. Draw a card.
card.flavortext: "All shall feel my wrath." - Halavar

card.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
card.cardtext: Arms Hero Required Ongoing: Your Two-Handed weapons have +5 ATK.

card.name: Unrelenting Assault
card.cardtext: You can't play other cards this turn. If you've played no other cards this turn, when your hero attacks this turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready your hero and all of your Melee weapons.

card.name: Warrior Training
card.cardtext: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can attack only attached ally if able.

card.name: Withering Shout
card.cardtext: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -1 health.

card.name: Wreck
card.cardtext: Interrupt target equipment card.
card.flavortext: "Oops!"

card.name: Bling
card.cardtext: Ongoing: You can have up to ten Rings.
card.flavortext: It messes with your grip a little, but you look fantastic.

card.name: Kiting
card.cardtext: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: 1 [>] Target hero or ally can't deal combat damage to attached ally this turn. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Meeting Stone
card.cardtext: Ongoing: [Activate], Exhaust two allies in your party [>] Search your deck for an ally card and put it into play.
card.flavortext: This mysterious boulder contains massive summoning energies that assemble adventuring parties to tackle the challenges inside a nearby dungeon.

card.name: Paper Airplane
card.cardtext: Put Paper Airplane on top of target player's deck. (He owns it for the rest of the game.)
card.flavortext: "Whee!"

card.name: Thundering Footsteps
card.cardtext: As an additional cost to play Thundering Footsteps, stomp your feet. Put a Mechanical ally token named Fel Reaver with 10 ATK / 10 health into play.
card.flavortext: "Do you hear something?"

card.name: Aldana
card.cardtext: Your weapons have +2 ATK while your hero is defending.
card.flavortext: "Come on. I'll even let you take the first shot."

card.name: Alhas
card.cardtext: At the start of your turn, Alhas heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
card.flavortext: "Light be with you."

card.name: Anders Blankheart
card.cardtext: Elusive If damage would be dealt with an ability you control to a hero or ally it's attached to, that much +1 is dealt instead.
card.flavortext: "Power is good. More power? Even better."

card.name: Archbishop Benedictus
card.cardtext: Heroes and allies can't attack.
card.flavortext: "Be at peace."

card.name: Arlek Stonehilt
card.cardtext: Elusive Each of your armor has +5 DEF while your hero is defending.
card.flavortext: "Take care of your armor, and it will take care of you."

card.name: Bakaar
card.cardtext: Your hero has long-range (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)
card.flavortext: "How much can you know about yourself if you've never been on a hunt?"

card.name: Blizzazz
card.cardtext: When Blizzazz enters play, draw a card.
card.flavortext: "What this fight needs is a little Blizzazz!"

card.name: Blademistress Lyss
card.cardtext: When an opposing hero or ally deals damage to Lyss, ready up to that many of your resources.
card.flavortext: Destruction can be beautiful.

card.name: Caretaker Devonar
card.cardtext: Protector Devonar is elusive while ready.

card.name: Caretaker Heartwing
card.cardtext: Heartwing is untargetable while ready.

card.name: Caretaker Mooncrier
card.cardtext: Ready allies in your party have +2 ATK.

card.name: Champion Zosimuus
card.cardtext: When a Holy ally in your party is dealt damage, it deals 2 holy damage to the source of that damage.
card.flavortext: "Retribution is swift upon the enemies of the Light."

card.name: "Cookie" McWeaksauce
card.cardtext: When Cookie enters play, each opponent puts a Chicken ally token with 0 ATK / 1 health into play. [Activate] [>] Destroy all ally tokens.
card.flavortext: "And for dessert we be havin' cheesecake, flown in fresh from Stormwind on the wings o' angels..."

card.name: The Darkeater
card.cardtext: Other Shadow allies have +2 ATK / +2 health. Non-Shadow allies have -2 ATK / -2 health.
card.flavortext: "Those who stand against the shadow will ultimately be consumed by it."

card.name: Durae Crystalshield
card.cardtext: Durae can protect friendly allies.

card.name: Force Commander Danath Trollbane
card.cardtext: Protector When Danath enters play, destroy target Horde ally.
card.flavortext: "The Sons will yield to no one - green, brown, and now red. We will overcome them or die trying."

card.name: Gabble
card.cardtext: Elusive (Can't be attacked.)

card.name: Gareth Ironshot
card.cardtext: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)

card.name: Givon
card.cardtext: Protector Opposing allies have -2 ATK while in combat with Givon.

card.name: Hanaga Silvervein
card.cardtext: Elusive (Can't be attacked) Your hero has +5 health.

card.name: Hoxie Mettlemelt
card.cardtext: At the start of your turn, Hoxie deals 2 fire damage to target opposing hero or ally for each Fire ally in your party.

card.name: Ingrid Shadowstorm
card.cardtext: Opposing heroes lose and can't have flip powers.

card.name: Jav Stonewall
card.cardtext: Protector, Untargetable

card.name: Kiki Sparkbottom
card.cardtext: Elusive (Can't be attacked.) Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)
card.flavortext: "Need a light?"

card.name: Kyla Duskrider
card.cardtext: Opponents pay 1 more to play weapons. Opponents pay 1 more to strike with weapons.

card.name: Magdeline Prideheart
card.cardtext: Protector When Magdeline defends, she heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.

card.name: Marnie Moonlight
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Marnie heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

card.name: Miner Harshdin
card.cardtext: At the start of your turn, target player puts the top card of his deck into his graveyard.

card.name: Miner Stonedeep
card.cardtext: At the start of your turn, target player puts the top five cards of his deck into his graveyard.

card.name: Piana
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Piana heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.

card.name: Rahn Grimstaff
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Target hero or ally has -1 health this turn.

card.name: Routeen
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Routeen deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally that was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Sharial
card.cardtext: Elusive (Can't be attacked.) [Activate] [>] Exhaust target equipment.

card.name: Shem Reznict
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Shem deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.

card.name: Syluri
card.cardtext: Protector Actiate, Destroy Syluri [>] Destroy target equipment.

card.name: Tarwila Gladespring
card.cardtext: Elusive (Can't be attacked.) [Activate] [>] You pay 1 less to play your next card this turn.

card.name: Tracker Pardo
card.cardtext: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.) Pardo has +1 ATK for each other ally in your party.

card.name: Waldo the Decoy
card.cardtext: Exhaust your hero [>] Exhaust target ally.
card.flavortext: "Surprise!"

card.name: Weeble
card.cardtext: Protector When Weeble enters play, draw two cards.
card.flavortext: Many foes have fallen to Weeble's wrath.

card.name: Zandar Shadesprocket
card.cardtext: Elusive (Can't be attacked.) When Zandar is dealt damage, also put that much on your hero.

card.name: "Acid Hands" McGillicutty
card.cardtext: When Acid Hands is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.

card.name: Arnerus Brightsteppe
card.cardtext: Each of your armor has +5 DEF while your hero is attacking.

card.name: Blood Knight Tarae
card.cardtext: Protector 1 [>] Remove target ability card in a graveyard from the game. If you do, Tarae heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
card.flavortext: "Blood Knights take what they need of the Light, and I am no exception."

card.name: Bloodblade
card.cardtext: Bloodblade can attack only heroes.
card.flavortext: Diplomats aren't the only ones who can resolve conflicts quickly.

card.name: Bloodeye
card.cardtext: Bloodeye can attack only heroes.
card.flavortext: "Have you heard of my brothers? No? Good."

card.name: Bloodsoul
card.cardtext: Bloodsoul can attack only heroes.
card.flavortext: "Doom comes for you, and it takes pleasure in your resistance."

card.name: Bolan Earthmend
card.cardtext: Protector When Bolan readies, he heals all damage from target ally.
card.flavortext: "The wind lets nothing stop its movement, so why should you?"

card.name: Captain Swash
card.cardtext: Swash has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
card.flavortext: "'Dashing' isn't a word I'd use to describe an orc - unless he were running." - Kintara Wintermoon

card.name: Cholda Wildbloom
card.cardtext: When Cholda enters play, you and target opponent each put the top card of your decks into your resource rows face down and exhausted.

card.name: Doshura Risestrider
card.cardtext: Protector When Doshura enters play, you may destroy target exhausted ally.
card.flavortext: "May the Earth Mother grant us her blessing and lend us the strength to protect her children."

card.name: Ezra Phoenix
card.cardtext: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.) When Ezra readies, he deals 2 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

card.name: "Fungus Face" McGillicutty
card.cardtext: When Fungus Face is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.
card.flavortext: Death hasn't robbed the Forsaken of the ability to understand what you say. They're just not likely to listen.

card.name: Golas Swiftwind
card.cardtext: When Golad readies, exhaust target ally.
card.flavortext: "An unprepared target is a welcome one."

card.name: Grandma Deadsie
card.cardtext: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Grandma Deadsie.
card.flavortext: "You wouldn't hurt a harmless old lady, would you?"

card.name: Groundshaker Earnheart
card.cardtext: When Earnheart is dealt damage, draw a card.
card.flavortext: "If brute force doesn't work, you aren't using enough."

card.name: Gurzuk
card.cardtext: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
card.flavortext: "The Horde is prepared to meet any threat head on. Perhaps you'd like a demonstration?"

card.name: Hota the Bloodsoaked
card.cardtext: Hota has protector while an opponent has more allies than you.

card.name: Imp Mistress Noali
card.cardtext: Your face-down resources are also Imp Demon allies with 1 ATK / 1 health.
card.flavortext: "I command you, my minions! Wash over the enemy like a sea of fire and burn them from this plane!"

card.name: Instructor Antheol
card.cardtext: 1 [>] This turn, target ally can't attack or protect, loses and can't have powers, and is a Boar. Use only once per turn.
card.flavortext: "Don't worry, they're not stuck in that form permanently."

card.name: Jaedan Sunshot
card.cardtext: When you play an ability, Jaedan has long-range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to her.)

card.name: Ja'zoona
card.cardtext: Opponents pay 1 more to complete quests.

card.name: Jurpak
card.cardtext: 2 [>] Target ally has ferocity this turn. (It can attack immediately.)

card.name: Kallas Sunflame
card.cardtext: 1 [>] Other Fire allies in your party have +1 ATK this turn.

card.name: Marka Addington
card.cardtext: At the start of your turn, Marka deals 3 fire damage to herself.
card.flavortext: "Let me give you a small sample of the maelstrom of agony and torment I feel with every waking moment."

card.name: Nazgrel, Advisor to Thrall
card.cardtext: Protector When Nazgrel enters play, destroy target Alliance ally.
card.flavortext: "The struggle to free the orcish people from our tainted blood has not been easy."

card.name: Osha Shadowdrinker
card.cardtext: When a Shadow ally in your party deals combat damage, ready up to that many of your resources.

card.name: Ossandran, Crematorium Master
card.cardtext: When an opposing ability, ally, equipment, or resource is destroyed, remove it from the game.
card.flavortext: "You can't make something un-undead."

card.name: "Poison Tongue" McGillicutty
card.cardtext: When Poison Tongue is destroyed, you may destroy target resource.

card.name: Ruala the Spotter
card.cardtext: Exhaust your hero [>] Target ally has +3 ATK this turn.
card.flavortext: "Never been good at fightin', mon. Spottin', that's my trade."

card.name: Seamus Somerset
card.cardtext: Ferocity When Seamus attacks, you may remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
card.flavortext: "Can it wait? I'm busy here."

card.name: Shadala
card.cardtext: When you play an ability, you may destroy target ability

card.name: Silea Dawnwalker
card.cardtext: When you play an ability, you may destroy target equipment.
card.flavortext: All blood elves are tied to the arcane, even those who don't practice the arts themselves.

card.name: "Spider Legs" McGillicutty
card.cardtext: Protector When Spider Legs is destroyed, you may exhaust target hero or ally.
card.flavortext: The undead protect what's important, even after their last breath.

card.name: Trytha Darksun
card.cardtext: At the start of each player's turn, he exhausts one of his resources.
card.flavortext: "I don't trust a source of energy until I've sampled it for myself."

card.name: Tyrennius Scratheblade
card.cardtext: Protector

card.name: Varimathras
card.cardtext: At the end of your turn, Varimathras deals 5 shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally. When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
card.flavortext: "I'm always on the winning side."

card.name: Volin Netherburn
card.cardtext: When you play an ability, Volin deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and 2 shadow damage to himself.

card.name: Wysko
card.cardtext: Your weapons have +1 ATK while your hero is attacking.

card.name: Yellowspine
card.cardtext: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.) Other allies in your party can protect Yellowspine.

card.name: Zul'that Steeltusk
card.cardtext: Damage that Holy allies in your party would deal is unpreventable.

card.name: Adyen the Lightwarden
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Cards can't leave opposing graveyards.
card.flavortext: The Aldor are keepers of the Light and servants of the naaru.

card.name: Anchorite Alonora
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Inspire: Ally (Ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.)
card.flavortext: "We of the priesthood must lead by example for the denizens of Shattrath."

card.name: Anchorite Jaliah
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) When an ally in your party is destroyed, Jaliah heals 2 damage from each hero and ally in your party.
card.flavortext: "Though I cannot save everyone, I can certainly do my best to try."

card.name: Anchorite Viluaa
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Inspire: Hero (Ready your hero during each other player's ready step.)
card.flavortext: "You'll always be in my prayers, champion."

card.name: Darynus
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Protector Inspire: Ally (Ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.)
card.flavortext: "This is my elekk. There are many like it, but this one is mine."

card.name: Ishanah, High Priestess of Aldor
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) At the start of each opponent's turn, he chooses an ally in his party. Gain control of that ally.
card.flavortext: "The Light cleanses all."

card.name: Marksman Boriz
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.) Opposing heroes and allies lose and can't have long-range.
card.flavortext: The Aldor marksmen stand guard against the Legion's inevitable assault on Shattrath City.

card.name: Neophyte Morandi
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) If an ally in your party other than Morandi would be dealt damage, it's dealt to Morandi instead.
card.flavortext: Sworn servants of the naaru, the Aldor stand between the Legion and all those it would harm.

card.name: Vindicator Belian
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) If an ally in your party other than Belian would be dealt damage, it's dealt to Belian instead.
card.flavortext: "If I must die, I will gladly do so to make a difference!"

card.name: Vindicator Dindro
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Inspire: Weapon (Ready one of your weapons during each other player's ready step.)

card.name: Vindicator Kaldel
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Inspire: Ally (Ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.)

card.name: Vindicator Khorin
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) If an ally in your party other than Khorin would be dealt damage, it's dealt to Khorin instead.

card.name: Vindicator Melina
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Inspire: Equipment (Ready one of your equipment during each other player's ready step.)

card.name: Vindicator Trytan
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Protector Inspire: Armor (Ready one of your armor during each other player's ready step.)
card.flavortext: The Aldor and their naaru patrons actively work to be a beacon of hope in a broken world.

card.name: Vindicator Zalreth
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation, Protector When Zalreth is destroyed, you may remove him from the game. If you do, put an ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

card.name: Xavar the Resourceful
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) Inspire: Resource (Ready one of your resources during each other player's ready step.)

card.name: Zaistor the Vigilant
card.cardtext: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.) 1, Destroy Zaistor [>] Target hero or ally can't be destroyed this turn.
card.flavortext: Paladins strongly believe self-sacrifice is a tool to be used for the greater good.

card.name: Arcane Guardian
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) ProtectorArcane Guardian has +1 ATK / +1 health for each card in your hand.
card.flavortext: "Happiness is mandatory, citizen."

card.name: Arcanist Avelena
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Sabotage: Ability (This ally can attack opposing abilities.) When Avelena sabotages an ability, put it on top of its owner's deck.

card.name: Arcanist Raith
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Opponents play with the top card of their decks revealed.
card.flavortext: "Feeling a little exposed? That might be my fault."

card.name: Arcanist Tian
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) You may look at the top card of your deck at any time.

card.name: Magister Ashi
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Stealth: (Can't protect against this character.) When Ashi enters play, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Magister Lashan
card.cardtext:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Sabotage: Resource (This ally can attack opposing resources.)
When Lashan sabotages a resource, destroy it.

card.name: Magistrix Fyalenn
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) You can't discard cards.
card.flavortext: "Do you wish to aid us in our battle against Kael'thas?"

card.name: Magistrix Oleinas
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Ally cards in your hand are instant.

card.name: Magistrix Tibrana
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Sabotage: Attached Ability (This ally can attack opposing attached abilities.) When Tibrana sabotages an ability, gain control of it. You may attach it to another hero or ally.

card.name: Retainer Jitaen
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Sabotage: Quest (This ally can attack opposing quests.) When Jitaen sabotages a quest, turn it face down.
card.flavortext: "Looking for someone? Let me clue you in: they're dead."

card.name: Retainer Kedryn
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Stealth: (Can't protect against this character.) When Kedryn deals combat damage to an ally, destroy that ally.
card.flavortext: It is not my job to think. There are others for that. My purpose is death.

card.name: Retainer Khorbus
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) When Khorbus deals combat damage, put him from play into his owner's hand.

card.name: Retainer Mythras
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation When Mythras enters play, target opponent gains control of him. Mythras can't attack. At the end of your turn, destroy an ally in your party other than Mythras. If you can't, destroy Mythras.
card.flavortext: The Scryers aren't known for taking the direct approach.

card.name: Retainer Nealos
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Sabotage: Weapon (This ally can attack opposing weapons.) When Nealos sabotages a weapon, exhaust it. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

card.name: Retainer Salvan
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Sabotage: Armor (This ally can attack opposing armor.) When Salvan sabotages a player's armor, exhaust all of that player's armor.

card.name: Retainer Zaelan
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.) Sabotage: Equipment (This ally can attack opposing equipment.) When Zaelan sabotages an equipment, put it into its owner's hand.

card.name: Voren'thal the Seer
card.cardtext: Scryer Reputation (can't put Aldor cards in your deck) If you would draw a card, draw two instead.
card.flavortext: "We need to show our people who Kael'thas is really working for."

card.name: A'dal
card.cardtext: Prevent all damage that would be dealt.
card.flavortext: (You are safe here.)

card.name: Arazzius the Cruel
card.cardtext: When Arazzius attacks, each player destroys an ally in his party.
card.flavortext: "You will find him at the Pools of Aggonar. If not, his evil will most certainly find you." -Force Commander Danath Trollbane

card.name: Doom Lord Kazzak
card.cardtext: At the end of your turn, destroy all non-Demon allies
card.flavortext: "Now the shadow of the Legion falls over the world. It is only a matter of time until all of your failed creation...is undone."

card.name: Fel Cannon
card.cardtext: When a player plays a card, Fel Cannon deals 2 fire damage to that player's hero.
card.flavortext: "The Burning Legion has no need for ammunition like cannonballs. The demons utilize far more potent weaponry." -Dralor

card.name: Razorsaw
card.cardtext: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.) When Razorsaw enters play, he deals 4 ranged damage to target ally in your party. When Razorsaw leaves play, he deals 4 ranged damage to target ally.
card.flavortext: Many mo'arg are tinkerers, scientists, blacksmiths, and engineers that have "improved" their own bodies with bionic parts.

card.name: Robotic Homing Chicken
card.cardtext: Elusive At the start of your turn, each player rolls a die. If two or more players roll the same number, destroy Robotic Homing Chicken and all allies in those players' parties.
card.flavortext: Decades of gnomish engineering have produced the ultimate design in fowl weaponry.

card.name: Shattrath City Peacekeeper
card.cardtext: Protector Allies not named Shattrath City Peacekeeper have -1 ATK.
card.flavortext: For every fragile haven, there are those who would defend it.

card.name: Sironas
card.cardtext: At the start of your turn, the player with the most resources destroys one of them. If two or more players are tied, you choose which one destroys a resource.
card.flavortext: "The draenei's fatal flaw is their trusting nature."

card.name: Warbringer Arix'amal
card.cardtext: Other Demons have +2 ATK.
card.flavortext: "The portal's activation key will be held by the Point's commander, Warbringer Arix'amal. Slay him. Take the key."

card.name: Abyss Walker's Boots
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
card.flavortext: Comfort, support, and most of all, style. What more do you need when traveling the abyss?

card.name: Bloodstained Ravager Gauntlets
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Double target weapon's ATK this turn.

card.name: Demon Hide Spaulders
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Each of your weapons has +1 ATK this turn. [Activate] [>] Each of your armor has +1 DEF this turn.
card.flavortext: "Considerin' what I went through to get da blasted thing, I'd say it was worth it." -Zag'zl

card.name: Demonfang Ritual Helm
card.cardtext: When an ally in your party is destroyed, each other player destroys an ally in his party.
card.flavortext: "To succeed, we must sacrifice. And by 'we', I mean 'you.'" -Forang Deathrattle

card.name: Devil-Stiched Leggings
card.cardtext: 3, Exhaust your hero [>] Target hero or ally has -3 health this turn.

card.name: Doomplate Chestguard
card.cardtext: Your hero has protector while you have five or more equipment.
card.flavortext: "I promise that you will break before it does." -Halavar

card.name: Fel Leather Gloves
card.cardtext: When a resource enters play, put 2 damage on its controllers hero.
card.flavortext: The craftsmanship shows that such potent evil is not a unique trait of the corrupted.

card.name: Gauntlets of the Skullsplitter
card.cardtext: When an ally in your party attacks, you may exhaust target armor.
card.flavortext: "The head is the toughest part of the body to penetrate. If you got that beat, then armor is nothing." -Bloody Mary

card.name: Hauberk of Desolation
card.cardtext: When you strike with a weapon, you may ready an ally in your party.

card.name: Mana-Etched Vestments
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Use only if you have seven or more cards in hand.
card.flavortext: Overflowing power has to go somewhere.

card.name: Manaspark Gloves
card.cardtext: At the start of your turn, if a player has fewer cards in hand than each other player, he draws a card.

card.name: Platinum Shield of the Valorous
card.cardtext: Platinum Shield of the Valorous has +1 DEF for each face-down resource you have.
card.flavortext: "Attack fiercely, but be ready for a counter! Knowing when to raise your shield will save your hide!" -Hekto Starspire

card.name: Shadowstalker's Sash
card.cardtext: Friendly Druids and Rogues have stealth. (Can't protect against them.)

card.name: Stormshield of Renewal
card.cardtext: When your hero heals damage from a friendly ally, it also heals that much from itself.

card.name: Wastewalker Tunic
card.cardtext: Wastewalker Tunic has +5 DEF while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
card.flavortext: Give me your tired...

card.name: Bladefist's Breadth
card.cardtext: When you play a weapon, ready your hero.
card.flavortext: "Ours is the TRUE Horde! The only Horde!" -Kargath Bladefist

restrictions.class: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior

card.name: Freezing Band
card.cardtext: Each opponent can't draw more than one card per turn.
card.flavortext: "We can't have you going too fast now, can we?" -Blaize Brightspark

card.name: Ring of Flowing Light
card.cardtext: [Activate], Exhaust X of your equipment [>] Your hero heals X damage from itself.

card.name: Vengeance of the Illidari
card.cardtext: When you play an ability, ready your hero.

restrictions.class: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock

card.name: Axe of the Legion
card.cardtext: Your other Axes have +2 ATK. Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

card.name: Blade of Unquenched Thirst
card.cardtext: At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Blade of Unquenched Thirst this turn, destroy it.
card.flavortext: Blood is the only liquid that can temper the blade.

card.name: Braxxis' Staff of Slumber
card.cardtext: When you control a Form, your hero has +2 ATK while attacking and each of your armor has +2 DEF.
card.flavortext: Braxxis found that the most benefit one can receive is often in a good night's sleep.

card.name: The Bringer of Death
card.cardtext: 3, [Activate], Destroy The Bringer of Death [>] Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment. Use only on your turn.

card.name: Crimson Shocker
card.cardtext: When Crimson Shocker enters play, your hero may deal 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
card.flavortext: The heat of the Molten Core shimmers inside the wand's glowing tip.

card.name: Crystalfire Staff
card.cardtext: Exhaust your hero [>] Target player draws a card.
card.flavortext: "Do you know how hot a jewel has to get to burn? That's a lot of power!" -Blaize Brightspark

card.name: Demonblood Eviscerator
card.cardtext: Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

card.name: Demonslayer
card.cardtext: When you strike with Demonslayer, you may destroy target Demon ally.
card.flavortext: A weapon isn't born with a name, it earns it.

card.name: The Essence Focuser
card.cardtext: If a hero or ally in your party would heal damage, it heals that much +1 instead.

card.name: Greatsword of Horrid Dreams
card.cardtext: As an ally enters play under an opponent's control, it loses and can't have powers until the start of that opponent's next turn.
card.flavortext: "The weapon bespeaks a legacy of pain and chaos! Wield it carefully, else you become mad from its visions." -Hekto Starspire

card.name: Hemet's Elekk Gun
card.cardtext: Hemet's Elekk Gun has +4 ATK while your hero is in combat with an ally with cost 5 or more. When you strike with Hemet's Elekk Gun, your hero has long-range this combat.
card.flavortext: "Take this and know that you are always welcome to hunt at my side." -Hemet Nesingwary

card.name: Hungering Bone Cudgel
card.cardtext: At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Hungering Bone Cudgel this turn, destroy it.
card.flavortext: Who's using whom?

card.name: Nexus Torch
card.cardtext: When combat damage is dealt with Nexus Torch to a defending hero, that hero's controller discards a card.
card.flavortext: "You think you know what you are going to do, but I can see you are sorely mistaken." -Kintara Wintermoon

card.name: Runesong Dagger
card.cardtext: When you draw a card, put a verse counter on Runesong Dagger. 1, Remove three verse counters [>] Your hero deals three arcane damage to target ally.
card.flavortext: Its lyrics are a chorus of death.

card.name: Scepter of the Unholy
card.cardtext: If a card or effect you control would cause an opponent to discard a card, he discards a random card instead.

card.name: Singing Crystal Axe
card.cardtext: Singing Crystal Axe enters play with four slow counters. You pay 1 more to strike with Singing Crystal Axe for each slow counter. When you strike with Singing Crystal Axe, remove a slow counter.

card.name: Skyfire Hawk-Bow
card.cardtext: When you strike with Skyfire Hawk-Bow, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)
card.flavortext: "On fiery wings does this arrow seek its target." -Kassandra Flameheart

card.name: Terokk's Quill
card.cardtext: Terokk's Quill has +4 ATK while your hero is defending.
card.flavortext: Mightier than the sword.

card.name: Wand of Eternal Light
card.cardtext: Damage that would be dealt with Wand of Eternal Light is unpreventable.

card.name: Whispering Blade of Slaying
card.cardtext: Your other daggers have +1 ATK. Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)
card.flavortext: The only sound you hear is the body hitting the ground.

card.name: Against the Legion
card.cardtext: If an opponent has more resources than you, pay 1 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.
card.flavortext: "You've proven you're not tainted by the Legion's touch, and the enemy of my enemy is my friend." -Altruis the Sufferer

card.name: The Blood is Life
card.cardtext: During your turn, destroy an ally in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest. Reward: Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's health.
card.flavortext: "You must infiltrate the Blood Furnace inside Hellfire Citadel. Brind back samples of blood from the fel orcs that you find in there." -Caza'rez

card.name: Buying Time
card.cardtext: During your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: You and target opponent each put the top card of your decks in your resource rows face down and exhausted.
card.flavortext: "If you can keep their engineers and tinkerers busy, it would greatly slow down their progress, buying me the time I need." -Altruis the Sufferer

card.name: Demonic Contamination
card.cardtext: During your turn, put 1 damage on each of three different allies in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw two cards.
card.flavortext: "While many creatures here have already undergone radical changes, they continue to mutate." -Thiah Redmane

card.name: Dousing the Flames of Protection
card.cardtext: Pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: Choose a hero or ally in your party. Damage that character would deal is unpreventable this turn.
card.flavortext: "Douse each of their flames, and the protections the Council has set up will take." -Greta Mosshoof

card.name: Falling to Corruption
card.cardtext: Destroy two of your resources and pay 1 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw two cards.
card.flavortext: "There is a large group of furbolg just past Timbermaw Hold, in Felwood. Called the Deadwood Tribe, they have been corrupted and driven mad by the fel." -Donova Snowden

card.name: A Final Blow
card.cardtext: If you played an equipment this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.
card.flavortext: "Shadow Lord Fel'dan is the mortal in power down below…he is the head of the serpent, the one making pacts with the Legion." -Greta Mosshoof

card.name: Forces of Jaedenar
card.cardtext: If you played an ability this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.
card.flavortext: "How was your first taste of their power? Were they as strong as you thought they would be?" -Greta Mosshoof

card.name: Forge Camp: Annihilated
card.cardtext: Pay 3 to complete this quest. Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of your deck.
card.flavortext: "Of course! We will use their own weapons against them!" -Altruis the Sufferer

card.name: The Formation of Felbane
card.cardtext: Pay 7 to complete this quest. Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability, ally, equipment, and quest card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
card.flavortext: "You must take the tempered arcanite to one with the ability to harness fel energy." -Loramus Thalipedes

card.name: Gurok the Usurper
card.cardtext: [Activate] [>] Choose one of your quests. Gurok the Usurper has that quest's powers this turn.
card.flavortext: "Gurok must be summoned. You summon Gurok and you destroy." -Gordawg

card.name: Hellfire Fortifications
card.cardtext: If you played an ally this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.
card.flavortext: The fortifications of Hellfire Citadel are the keys to supremacy in the region.

card.name: Levixus the Soul Caller
card.cardtext: Pay 3 to complete this quest. Reward: Put a random card from your graveyard into your hand.
card.flavortext: "You will find Levixus on the uppermost ruins of Auchindoun. He stands amidst a storm of souls…" -Nitrin the Learned

card.name: Mission: The Abyssal Shelf
card.cardtext: Pay 6 to complete this quest. Reward: Roll six dice one at a time from 6 inches above play. For each die that lands on an opposing ally, put damage on it equal to that roll.

card.name: The Name of the Beast
card.cardtext: Pay 3 to complete this quest. Reward: Choose "ability," "ally," "equipment," or "quest." Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed card of that kind into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
card.flavortext: "You return! Astounding. Did you discover the true name?" -Loramus Thalipedes

card.name: Natural Remedies
card.cardtext: Pay 0 to complete this quest. Reward: Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one on top of your deck and the other on the bottom.
card.flavortext: "Beware, I sense an external force at play here...This is not natural!" -Earthbinder Galandna Nightbreeze

card.name: An OOX of Your Own
card.cardtext: During your turn, pay 6 to complete this quest. Reward: Put three Mechanical Chicken ally tokens with 0 ATK / 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, remove them from the game and draw a card for each token removed this way.
card.flavortext: "I normally wouldn't let anyone have such a potentially lethal device, but you've been a real help." -Oglethorpe Obnoticus

card.name: Pride of the Fel Horde
card.cardtext: Pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: If you have no ready resources, draw a card.
card.flavortext: "Fel Horde troops under the command of Kargath Bladefist are a brutal, battle-hardened lot fortified by foul magics." -Field Commander Romus

card.name: Retribution of the Light
card.cardtext: Pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: All players shuffle their graveyards into their decks.
card.flavortext: "Return to Shadow Hold, kill Trey's torturer, and find his remains. There is no reason we can't tie off all these loose ends while Arko'narin mourns in her own private way." -Jessir Moonbow

card.name: The Root of All Evil
card.cardtext: During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest. Reward: Turn target quest face down.
card.flavortext: "Only the essence of the fallen demon will begin the lengthy healing process of the Winterfall tribe…and the salvation of Timbermaw Hold." -Gorn One Eye

card.name: The Spirit Polluted
card.cardtext: Put 3 damage on your hero and pay 1 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.
card.flavortext: "Watoosun was able to shed the stink of corruption, but in doing so, created a twisted spirit essence." -Elementalist Lo'ap

card.name: Survey the Land
card.cardtext: Pay 3 to complete this quest. Reward: If you control an ability, ally, or equipment, draw a card, or two cards if you control all three.
card.flavortext: "Even the smallest detail that you may think inconsequential could be useful for our purposes." -Altruis the Sufferer

card.name: Toxic Horrors
card.cardtext: Pay 3 to complete this quest. Reward: Choose up to two players. Each of them draws a card.
card.flavortext: "I believe that the Deadwood furbolg may be gathering these elements from the elementals living in the Irontree Woods…" -Donova Snowden

card.name: A Traitor Among Us
card.cardtext: If an ally in your party was destroyed this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.
card.flavortext: "Anywhere you see a tribe of enslaved Broken, you will also find a traitor. A despicable being who sold his brothers for promises of power." -Naladu

card.name: Wanted: Durn the Hungerer
card.cardtext: If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.
card.flavortext: "Durn's murderous grip has been loosed! Nagrand has a brighter tomorrow because of you, hero. Well done!" -Warden Bullrok

card.name: You Are Rakh'likh, Demon
card.cardtext: Pay 4 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if a Demon is in your party.
card.flavortext: "Should you defeat the Defiler, bring back his horn. It will become a symbol of hope for all that view it - proof that heroes do exist in this war-torn world." -Fallen Hero of the Horde
